data.title: Author Visit – Naima B Robert

data.text:
We are honoured to announce that Teens Inspired Book Club will be hosting our second author visit . Naima B Roberts will be joining us to discuss what inspired her to become an author and share any advice for our teens who want to become authors. There will be a chance to ask her your questions and find out more about Teens Inspired Book Club.

Date: Monday 13th September 2021

Time: 5.30pm – 6.30pm

Location: Online on Zoom (Zoom link will be shared 24hrs before)

About the author:

Na’ima B. Robert is a trail-blazing speaker, coach and best-selling author

of ‘From My Sisters’ Lips’, as well as over 25 other books that have been

translated into over 14 languages. She is the recipient of several literary

awards and is a respected author of diverse fiction and the author of the

newly released ‘Show Up: A Motivational Message for Muslim Women.’
